FyD8J90iWSrCcU_59.name: Armor
FyD8J90iWSrCcU_59.notes: Meteoric and Orichalcum are mutually exclusive

frvqQ95LjSFuOmibu.name: Hobnails
frvqQ95LjSFuOmibu.notes: Cancels the -2 to attack and -1 to defend (but not the movement penalties) for Bad Footing

fJC9y1Sxrbl_9BjMb.name: Giant-Spider Silk
fJC9y1Sxrbl_9BjMb.notes: Allows this armor to be worn under other armor without -1 to DX for layering

f-YZyXDU10ReRmAAr.name: Spiked
f-YZyXDU10ReRmAAr.notes: Every turn, roll DX-4 to stab each enemy in close combat with you as a free action; success deals 1d-2 imp damage; In addition, anyone who strikes such armor with an unarmed attack takes this damage to the attacking body part — and if the attack is a bite, grapple, or anything under Slams, Tramples, and Overruns (DFX40), the attacker suffers 4 points of damage

fUNuM6_YKGximfTBY.name: Thieves’
fUNuM6_YKGximfTBY.notes: Blackened; May not be Ornate; After adding this to your armor, edit the armor and enable the "Ignore weight for skills" checkbox

F8pfhao25owUhkc-i.name: Shields
F8pfhao25owUhkc-i.notes: Dwarven, Meteoric, and Orichalcum are mutually exclusive

fHfTRWdjpDmtvku-x.name: Dwarven
fHfTRWdjpDmtvku-x.notes: Fireproof; Made from iron instead of wood

FavvTEEgM-i2cWgnW.name: For Dwarven, Meteoric, or Orichalcum shields only

fu4M3nl-UgATCyRuN.name: Mirrored
fu4M3nl-UgATCyRuN.notes: Target of a reflected gaze gets +3 to resist

f-8K9pF6G-U4ZKtMY.name: Mirrored
f-8K9pF6G-U4ZKtMY.notes: Target of a reflected gaze gets +3 to resist

fnvd8PPoSEl_hDawK.name: Orichalcum
fnvd8PPoSEl_hDawK.notes: Unbreakable; Fireproof; +2 to odds of breakage of non-Orichalcum weapons parrying a Shield Bash or Shield Rush

FdbYnYYPpvyJ4LxNh.name: Weapons
FdbYnYYPpvyJ4LxNh.notes: Meteoric, Orichalcum, and solid Silver are mutually exclusive; Fine, Very Fine, and solid Silver are mutually exclusive

fuQqw6xmyi9vw286-.name: Dwarven
fuQqw6xmyi9vw286-.notes: Changes a Parry of 0U to 0 (manually adjust)

F3nOBlIN0MeQbrwzC.name: For arrow and crossbow bolt only

fxkTpHcJcbCH2F-Ov.name: Bodkin Point
fxkTpHcJcbCH2F-Ov.notes: Changes damage type to pi and adds armor divisor (2)

fa_QGLqZE8PRu5aNp.name: Flaming
fa_QGLqZE8PRu5aNp.notes: Takes a ready maneuver to ignite before use; Must be fired within 3 seconds of ignition; -2 to hit; Inflicts additional 1 burn damage as follow-up

FgdCwgPYMeEYDO4aI.name: For blowpipe, bow, and crossbow only

fU5mUl9gS287CftG-.name: Bow-Harp
fU5mUl9gS287CftG-.notes: Allows the bow to be used as a harp as well

fZ-Im3ajtHUn84ag9.name: Elven
fZ-Im3ajtHUn84ag9.notes: Lets a bow shoot at +2 to ST for range and damage purposes without increasing its minimum ST (manually adjust Rated ST)

fqxCK9aXGvBwHMF1k.name: Crossbow Sling
fqxCK9aXGvBwHMF1k.notes: Totes a loaded crossbow hands free; Free action to sling

FK1XFDYryK_efCYfq.name: For fencing weapons and swords only

FDFKWjF_dljCbksiy.name: For hatchet, jutte, pick, sai, sickle, tonfa, and one-handed axe only

FrKzaNCJTIi7MVGYr.name: For melee weapon, thrown weapon, and projectile only

F3D3VujRatv2FbW1x.name: For fencing weapons, swords, blowpipes, bows, and crossbows

FjvtPTRJzhZ2jHfTo.name: For other cutting melee or thrown weapons

F1Vysr5zLx6Kze4Py.name: For projectiles and crushing- or impaling-only melee or thrown weapons

fXb07d6wH0uVaTOEj.name: Silver Coating
fXb07d6wH0uVaTOEj.notes: Penetration wound modifiers drop a level: x2 becomes x1.5, x3 becomes x2, and x4 becomes x3

fHY4j3Q2FBCoxeA8h.name: Orichalcum
fHY4j3Q2FBCoxeA8h.notes: Unbreakable; +2 to odds of breakage of non-orichalcum weapons parrying this weapon
